Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Golden Dolphin Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Golden Dolphin Way and Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Leviathan Drive heads off to the north from here, and continues uninterrupted until it reaches the northern City Walls, many miles to the north. Golden Dolphin Way marks the southern edge of the City of Oceancrest, running parallel to the great City Walls, which enclose the entire city.
